name: Classic Tabbouleh
description: A refreshing salad with parsley, mint, tomatoes, and fine bulgur.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse bulgur wheat and soak in cold water for 5 minutes, then drain well.
In a large bowl, combine parsley, mint, tomatoes, and onion.
Add the drained bulgur wheat and mix well.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving to allow flavors to meld.

keywords: tabbouleh, parsley salad, Lebanese salad, bulgur wheat
